synopsis.text:
Sister Rosette Christopher and her demonic partner, Chrono, are an unlikely duo working for the Magdalene Order in 1920s New York. The organization's mission is to combat the growing number of sinister demons that have emerged in the aftermath of World War I. Armed with holy weapons, Rosette and Chrono are known for their effectiveness in eliminating demonic threats, despite the collateral damage they often cause.

As they navigate the increasingly dangerous world of demonic activity, Rosette and Chrono are driven by their shared past and a personal mission. Rosette is desperate to find her missing brother, Joshua, who was taken by a powerful demon named Aion. Chrono, on the other hand, has a mysterious connection to Aion and seeks to uncover the truth about his own past.

With their lives intertwined and their fates uncertain, Rosette and Chrono must rely on each other to fight against the growing demonic menace and uncover the secrets that bind them together. Will they be able to find Joshua and stop the apocalyptic horrors that threaten to consume the world, or will their quest lead them down a path of destruction? Only time will tell.
